column4: does anyone have any suggestions for a good video board for ubuntu? I have ATI and Nvidia boards but have lots of problems with them
Depends on what you intend to use it for. For good 3D performance, I'd recommend nVidia and their binary driver.

Again, what do you intend to use it for? I could always recommend an insane nVidia 9800 SLI setup, but if you are building say a mythtv box that is intended to connect to an old SD TV over svideo then that's insane overkill.
For 3D, pretty much the only alternative to ati/nvidia is intel onboard graphics or perhaps matrox (if excellent 2D multi-monitor is also a requirement).
